original_text: Having the understanding darkened, being alienated from the life of God through the ignorance that is in them, because of the blindness of their heart:
korean_text: 그들의 총명이 어두워지고 그들 가운데 있는 무지함과 그들의 마음이 굳어짐으로 말미암아 하나님의 생명에서 떠나 있도다

sentences.original_text: being alienated from the life of God
through the ignorance that is in them
because of the blindness of their heart
